skillTree.localised_description: Despite, or perhaps because of their drunkenness, the Centigors play one very important role in the world of the Beastmen. They are often used as the messengers of the Bray-Shamans, yet the messages they deliver are imparted to them when they are extremely drunk, and delivered in the same fashion.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +2 with Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Beastmen and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: The Beastman's tusks are drenched in gore - blood and sinew from every foul battle.

attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: There are no Beastmen more loyal to the self-alleged father of all Centigors than these.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Chaos smiles upon them, granting unnatural and heretical defence against mortal machinations.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.
"The blood is the prize. The blood is the prize! THE BLOOD IS THE PRIZE!"
Armed with a pair of lethal throwing axes – running away will not help.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit can pass through trees.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
"You don't wanna know where he keeps all of these axes.."
Blink and you die.
By which an unexpected shower of pointy death rains down upon the unfortunate targets. Ouch!
"I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can pass through trees.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some beings just don't know when to put the bottle down.
More than mere bloodlust, this one is filled with the primal, Ruinous rage of the Lord of Battle.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one has something of the compost heap about them…
Sometimes, letting so much blood that the soil itself is stained just isn't enough. And it will never be.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Minotaur units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
